LanguageData.CAL_AluminumTile.label: aluminum tile
LanguageData.CAL_AluminumTile.description: Aluminum tiles, for a utilitarian look. Quick to build, but neutral in terms of beauty.
LanguageData.CAL_BismuthTile.label: bismuth tile
LanguageData.CAL_BismuthTile.description: Oxidized bismuth tiles, for a rainbow look. Slow to build, and provides a small amount of beauty.
LanguageData.CAL_ChromiumTile.label: chromium tile
LanguageData.CAL_ChromiumTile.description: Chromium tiles provide a bright, mirrored floor. Very expensive and requires a lot of work to build.
LanguageData.CAL_NickelTile.label: nickel tile
LanguageData.CAL_NickelTile.description: Nickel tiles, for a bright look. Quick to build, but neutral in terms of beauty.
LanguageData.CAL_TinTile.label: tin tile
LanguageData.CAL_TinTile.description: Tin tiles, for a utilitarian look. Quick to build, but neutral in terms of beauty.
LanguageData.CAL_ZincTile.label: zinc tile
LanguageData.CAL_ZincTile.description: Zinc tiles, for a bright look. Quick to build, but neutral in terms of beauty.
